fields.name: Apartment
fields.description: A self-contained housing unit in a building, typically on one floor.

fields.name: Villa
fields.description: A luxurious stand-alone house, usually larger and with a garden.

fields.name: Plot
fields.description: A piece of land available for construction or investment.

fields.name: Office
fields.description: A commercial property used for business and workspaces.

fields.name: Commercial
fields.description: A retail space or outlet meant for selling products or services.
